info.name: Fork RLE Earth (variable length)
info.description:
The Earth, 512x256, run length encoded from a 16-color GIF. Original image by NASA.

Modified to use variable 1-2 byte spans with length up to 256. Uses color 15 as a marker (image actually only uses 15 colors). Saves about 4kB in binary data (~18%).

renderpass.name: Image
